<?php
    /**
     * æœˆã¾ãŸãã€å¹´ã¾ãŸãã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’è¿”å´ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
     *
     * @param  boolean $hasAddLastDayOfTheYear å½“å¹´ã®å¤§æ™¦æ—¥ã‚’å«ã‚ã‚‹ã‹
     * @param  boolean $inclueCurrentMonth     å½“æœˆã‚’ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«å«ã‚ã‚‹ã‹
     *
     * @return array   ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹
     */
    function getTestMonths($hasAddLastDayOfTheYear = true, $inclueCurrentMonth = false): array
    {
        $date = new DateTime();
        $testDates = [
            28 => false,
            29 => false,
            30 => false,
            31 => false,
        ];
        
        if ($inclueCurrentMonth) {
            $testDates[$date->format('t')] = clone $date;
        }

        if ($hasAddLastDayOfTheYear) {
            $testDates[1231] = new DateTime($date->format('Y') . '-12-31T' . $date->format('H:i:s.u'));
        }
    
        while(1) {
            addDays($date);
            
            if (!$testDates[$date->format('t')]) {
                $testDates[$date->format('t')] = clone $date;
            }
            
            if (!in_array(false, $testDates, true)) {
                break;
            }
        }
        
        return $testDates;
    }
    
    /**
     * å¼•æ•°ã§æ¸¡ã£ã¦ãã‚‹DateTimeã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç¿Œæœˆã¾ã§åŠ ç®—ã™ã‚‹
     *
     * @param DateTime $date
     *
     * @return void
     */
    function addDays($date)
    {
        $now = new DateTime();
        $nextMonthDate = clone $date;

        $nextMonthDate->modify('+' . $date->format('t') . ' days');
        $addDay = $date->format('t');
        
        // ï¼’ãƒ¶æœˆå¾Œã«ã„ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚‰æˆ»ã™
        if ($nextMonthDate->format('n') - $date->format('n') == 2) {
            $addDay = $date->format('t') - $date->format('j') + $nextMonthDate->modify('-3 days')->format('t');
        }

        // 27æ—¥ä»¥å‰ã¯ã“ã‚Œã ã‘ã§å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«
        $date->modify('+' . $addDay . ' days');
        
        // æœ€çµ‚æ—¥èª¿æ•´ã®å½±éŸ¿ã§å¢—ãˆã™ãã‚‹ãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§å°‘ãªãã™ã‚‹ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«å¯¾å¿œ
        if ($now->format('j') < $date->format('j')) {
             $date->modify('-' . $date->format('j') - $now->format('j') . ' days');
        }
        
        // ä»Šã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚ˆã‚Šå°ã•ã„ ã‹ã¤ å¯¾è±¡æœˆã®æœ€çµ‚æ—¥ã§ã¯ãªã„æ™‚ã¯æœ€çµ‚æ—¥ã«ãªã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«èª¿æ•´
        if ($now->format('j') > $date->format('j') && $date->format('j') != $date->format('t')) {
            $date->modify('+' . $date->format('t') - $date->format('j') . ' days');
        }
    }

        }

        if ($hasAddLastDayOfTheYear) {
            $testDates[1231] = new DateTime($date->format('Y') . '-12-31T' . $date->format('H:i:s.u'));
        }
    
        while(1) {
            $this->addDays($date);
            
            if (!$testDates[$date->format('t')]) {
                $testDates[$date->format('t')] = clone $date;
            }
            
            if (!in_array(false, $testDates, true)) {
                break;
            }
        }
        
        return $testDates;
    }
    
    /**
     * å¼•æ•°ã§æ¸¡ã£ã¦ãã‚‹DateTimeã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç¿Œæœˆã¾ã§åŠ ç®—ã™ã‚‹
     *
     * @access private
     * @param  DateTime $date
     *
     * @return void
     */
    private function addDays($date)
    {
        $now = new DateTime();
        $nextMonthDate = clone $date;

        $nextMonthDate->modify('+' . $date->format('t') . ' days');
        $addDay = $date->format('t');
        
        // ï¼’ãƒ¶æœˆå¾Œã«ã„ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚‰æˆ»ã™
        if ($nextMonthDate->format('n') - $date->format('n') == 2) {
            $addDay = $date->format('t') - $date->format('j') + $nextMonthDate->modify('-3 days')->format('t');
        }

        // 27æ—¥ä»¥å‰ã¯ã“ã‚Œã ã‘ã§å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«
        $date->modify('+' . $addDay . ' days');
        
        // æœ€çµ‚æ—¥èª¿æ•´ã®å½±éŸ¿ã§å¢—ãˆã™ãã‚‹ãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§å°‘ãªãã™ã‚‹ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«å¯¾å¿œ
        if ($now->format('j') < $date->format('j')) {
             $date->modify('-' . $date->format('j') - $now->format('j') . ' days');
        }
        
        // ä»Šã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚ˆã‚Šå°ã•ã„ ã‹ã¤ å¯¾è±¡æœˆã®æœ€çµ‚æ—¥ã§ã¯ãªã„æ™‚ã¯æœ€çµ‚æ—¥ã«ãªã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«èª¿æ•´
        if ($now->format('j') > $date->format('j') && $date->format('j') != $date->format('t')) {
            $date->modify('+' . $date->format('t') - $date->format('j') . ' days');
        }
    }
}
